game.title: The Lost City
game.objective: Find the lost city of Zenith and retrieve a powerful artifact.
game.description: Rumors have surfaced about an ancient city hidden deep within the forest, where a powerful artifact lies in wait. Brave adventurers are needed to navigate treacherous landscapes and battle ferocious creatures to reach the heart of the city.
game.quest-giver: Eriol the Wise, Wizard of the Tower

task.objective: Speak with the forest druid, Elwynn.
task.description: Seek out Elwynn in her glade and gather information about the city's location.

task.objective: Defeat the pack of goblins terrorizing travelers on the forest path.
task.description: Clear a safe passage through the forest by defeating the goblin pack and claiming their leader's amulet as proof.
task.location: The Forest Path, east of Eriol's Tower

task.objective: Navigate the treacherous jungle to reach the lost city.
task.description: Use your wits and knowledge to survive the deadly traps and creatures guarding the path to Zenith.
task.location: The Jungle, south of Elwynn's Glade

task.objective: Retrieve the artifact from the lost city.
task.description: Solve the puzzles and defeat the guardians to reach the heart of Zenith and claim the powerful artifact.
